en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Perwira K9 2nd AGM!
en.content:
REPORT SUBMITTED BY PERWIRA K9 FOUNDER ADVISOR CHONG TUCK MENG.

We Welcome You To Perwira K9 Malaysia's 2nd Annual General Assembly 2009 Held At:

Venue : Kuala Lumpur International Hotel Malaysia.
Date   : 07th February 2009.
Time   : 9:00am to 2:00pm.

For your information, Perwira K9 Malaysia is a non-profit organization that supports people with spinal cord injuries. We depend solely on the kindness and generosity of the corporate and the public to help us carry out activities to support this unfortunate group of citizens to carry on with their lives.

We take this opportunity to thank the management of FusionExcel who has repeatedly sponsored many of our activities in 2008. FusionExcel starts New Year 2009 with Perwira K9 by sponsoring Quantum Pendants to Spinal Ward K9 Hospital Kuala Lumpur. FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant provides the needed energy, strength, and all the benefits of scalar energy to help patients in their daily rehabilitation programs.

At our AGM 2009, FusionExcel again sponsored Quantum Pendants to our members who are on wheelchairs. We would like to thank FusionExcel's Presidential Director Mr James Ng who successfully demonstrated the instant effects of wearing the Quantum Pendants. Instead of giving away the Quantum Pendants, Mr Chong Tuck Meng who is the Founder Advisor of Perwira K9 carried out a quiz and answer to let the crowd understand better about this marvelous product.

To our surprise, the crowds have already come across FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant and answer all the questions correctly! Here are some of the pictures taken at the AGM.

Once again.... Thank you very much FusionExcel!
 
VIP Guest Dr Hjh Asiah Head of
Rehabilitation Hospital Kuala Lumpur.
Members Of The Committee.
Special Individual Award 2009.
Receipient Sister Om Bt Md Nor, Wearing Red.
Cake Cutting Ceremony For Our 2 Wedded Couples Fazlan Ismail And Nadia (wearing black) And
Abu Samah And Norisah.
Abu And Norisah Receiving Gift From Dr Asiah.
Fazlan And Nadia Receiving Gift From Dr Asiah.
Members Lining Up To Receive Ang Pows.
Mr James Ng Introducing And Demostrating the Quantum Pendant.
The Newly Elected Committee Of Perwira K9.
Group Picture Of The New Committee And Volunteers.
